intro: Selago triquetra, commonly known as the three-angled sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial that typically thrives in sandy or gravelly soils, often found in arid or semi-arid environments. Selago triquetra is well adapted to harsh conditions, making it a resilient species in its native range.
